commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: discount-postgres
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: discount_db
      POSTGRES_USER: discount_user
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: discount_pass
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U discount_user -d discount_db"]
      interval: 5s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5

  app:
    build: 
      context: ./discount
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: discount-app
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: jdbc:postgresql://postgres:5432/discount_db
      DATABASE_USERNAME: discount_user
      DATABASE_PASSWORD: discount_pass
      SERVER_PORT: 8082
      SERVER_HOST: 0.0.0.0
    ports:
      - "8082:8082"

volumes:
  postgres_data:
